tempHash.description: The hash of the TEMP file of this entity.

tbluHash.description: The hash of the TBLU file of this entity.

rootEntity.description: The root sub-entity of this entity.

propertyOverrides.description: Properties on other entities (local or external) to override when this entity is loaded.
propertyOverrides.markdownDescription:
Properties on other entities (local or external) to override when this entity is loaded.

Overriding a local entity would be a rather pointless maneuver given that you could just actually change it in the entity instead of using an override.

overrideDeletes.description: Entities (external or local) to delete (including their organisational children) when this entity is loaded.
overrideDeletes.markdownDescription:
Entities (external or local) to delete (including their organisational children) when this entity is loaded.

Deleting a local entity would be a rather pointless maneuver given that you could just actually remove it from this entity instead of using an override.

pinConnectionOverrides.description: Pin (event) connections (between entities, external or local) to add when this entity is loaded.

externalScenes.description: The external scenes that this entity references.

quickEntityVersion.description: The QuickEntity format version of this entity.

extraFactoryDependencies.description: Extra resource dependencies that should be added to the entity's factory when converted to the game's format.

extraBlueprintDependencies.description: Extra resource dependencies that should be added to the entity's blueprint when converted to the game's format.

parent.markdownDescription:
The "logical" or "organisational" parent of the entity, used for tree organisation in graphical editors.

Has no effect on the entity in game.

factoryFlag.markdownDescription:
The factory's flag.

You can leave this out if it's 1F.

editorOnly.description: Whether the entity is only loaded in IO's editor.
editorOnly.markdownDescription:
Whether the entity is only loaded in IO's editor.

Setting this to true will remove the entity from the game as well as all of its organisational (but not coordinate) children.

platformSpecificProperties.description: Properties to apply conditionally to the entity based on platform.

events.description: Inputs on entities to trigger when events occur.

inputCopying.description: Inputs on entities to trigger when this entity is given inputs.

outputCopying.description: Events to propagate on other entities.

propertyAliases.description: Properties on other entities that can be accessed from this entity.

exposedEntities.description: Entities that can be accessed from this entity.

exposedInterfaces.description: Interfaces implemented by other entities that can be accessed from this entity.

subsets.description: The subsets that this entity belongs to.

fromEntity.description: The entity that will trigger the input on the other entity.
fromEntity.markdownDescription:
The entity that will trigger the input on the other entity.

If this references a local entity, you can simply use an event on the entity itself.

fromPin.description: The name of the event on the fromEntity that will trigger the input on the toEntity.

toEntity.description: The entity whose input will be triggered.

toPin.description: The name of the input on the toEntity that will be triggered by the event on the fromEntity.

fromEntity.description: The entity that triggers the input on the other entity.

fromPin.description: The name of the event on the fromEntity that will no longer trigger the input on the toEntity.

toEntity.description: The entity whose input is triggered.

toPin.description: The name of the input on the toEntity that will no longer be triggered by the event on the fromEntity.
